name: This Side of Me
description:
Many of our fears
are based on false beliefs, 

and social anxiety is a good example of it. For those who suffer this kind of trouble, even a party can become a hardship.

This Side of Me explores the mechanisms at work in this type of fear and hints how to cope with them in a short interactive story. 

The team

This game was made by five students (and an a composer/arranger) in two and a half months at CNAM-ENJMIN, French school of games and interactive digital media:

Charles Chantriaux - UX Designer

Hugo Malézieux - 2D/3D artist

Abdoul-Jabar Mayaki - Sound designer

Tom Olivier-Beuf - Composer/arranger 

Baptiste Prévost - Programmer

Fiona Rosette - Game designer

As we still have a few bugs, the project is still in progress, but the story is already complete.
